home: I'm a Software Developer, UI/UX Designer and an Engineer.
about: I'm a dynamic individual with a passion for a well-rounded lifestyle. I find joy in staying active and fit, making frequent visits to the gym to engage in various workouts. The love for the outdoors is another facet of my life, as hiking, biking, and exploring nature provides a perfect balance to the tech-driven world. On the intellectual side, I'm deeply immersed in the fields of engineering and software development. With a keen interest in problem-solving and innovation, I enjoy tackling challenges both in the physical realm through engineering projects and in the virtual world through software development. This combination of a strong body, an adventurous spirit, and a sharp mind defines my multifaceted and fulfilling lifestyle.

education.description: I'm furthering my Software Development skills.
I got my certificates on graphic design.
I got my certificates on Mechanical Engineering.
I got my matric certificate with a bachelor's pass.

testimonials.name: Aakeefah
testimonials.quotes: Zubair is a true asset to any team. His passion for his work and the ability to deliver exceptional results make him an invaluable partner in any software development endeavor. I highly recommend him for any project.

testimonials.name: Thimna
testimonials.quotes: Zubair is one of most humble and respectful people that I know. One of he's brightest features in he's ability to grasp information and explain it to the next person like it is he's own which makes him a great leader and team player. One thing about him is that he knows how to manage he's time efficiently and he is able to communicate clearly whether if its within a crowd or one on one.

testimonials.name: Corne
testimonials.quotes: Zubair Moerat is an exceptional student and a valuable addition to any team. His dedication to learning and his problem-solving skills have consistently impressed me. Zubair's passion for coding and his ability to work under pressure make him a standout developer. I have no doubt that he will excel in any future endeavors in the tech industry.

testimonials.name: Al-Muakhir
testimonials.quotes: Always available to help, incredibly proficient, hits deadlines without fail, hard working and trustworthy. In my experience, no project is too much trouble, and with Zubair you really get a rare entity - someone that can simplify what can be a very complex industry at times.  I can recommend him without hesitation.

testimonials.name: Niyaaz
testimonials.quotes: Zubair an invaluable asset to any web development team. I wholeheartedly recommend him for his professionalism, expertise, and unwavering dedication to excellence in web development.

testimonials.name: Tamlin Leigh
testimonials.quotes: I wholeheartedly recommend Zubair Moerat for any challenging role in a leading IT company. His exceptional coding skills, collaborative mindset, and dedication to excellence make him an ideal candidate for positions that demand the very best.
